welcome_message_body: Welcome to Piove di Sacco, a charming city known for its beautiful canals and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our culture and cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marco Polo Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at S. Angelo Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trissino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Trissino Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
